tags: i wanted you to be better!
body:
Imagine tony after a narcosis

Okey, we talked about Peter after getting rid of his wisdom-teeths.

But imagine tony after an operation, completely full of anesthetic and extremely confused.

Tony, looking at Peter: Dad?!

Peter,confused: what?

Tony, more confused: why are you doing this??

Peter: DOING WHAT?

Tony: why did you never loved me?

Peter: I’m not your dad Tony!

Tony, just more confused: Don’t say that! Why was your work always more important than me?

Peter, don’t knowing what to do: I… Eh… It was just for you..?

Tony: Why?!

Peter, intense screaming, just saying the first thing in his mind: BECAUSE I WANTED YOU TO BE BETTER!

summary: Tony Stark calls himself Ironman, but technically he is FeMale Tony however said that his suit is made out of a Nickel Titanium...
body:
Tony Stark calls himself Ironman, but technically he is FeMale

Tony however said that his suit is made out of a Nickel Titanium alloy so he would either be NiTi Man or TiNi Man

blog.name: dragonslayingviking
blog.title: Dragonslaying Viking
blog.description: Hello, and welcome to my corner of the internet! Here you will find anything from bad puns to the magnificent Tom Hiddleston! English is my second language and I'm new to Tumblr, so please bear with my mistakes:)

summary: IF Tony Stark has to die, can it please be nice? Not some sudden heroic act that saves the day but ends him, but something nice....
body:
IF Tony Stark has to die, can it please be nice? Not some sudden heroic act that saves the day but ends him, but something nice.

Like he’s older and weary and in a hospital bed, the poisoning from the arc reactor becoming too much. So we know it’s coming, and he knows too. And people can come and visit him and be with him and sort things out. Let him forgive what others regret and let others forgive him and let them know. So they can all have peace, and say goodbye and not be traumatised by a sudden loss. Please let me have something nice, I high key think I deserve it

So they can all have peace, and say goodbye and not be traumatised by a sudden loss. Please let me have something nice, I high key think I deserve it

blog.name: triciaorgana
blog.title: stay afraid, but do it anyway

summary: I  AM  NOTICING  A  TREND  WHERE  PEOPLE  WHO  DON’T  LIKE  TONY  STARK  ARE  ALSO  PEOPLE  WHO  HAVEN’T  WATCHED  IRON  MAN  1,...
body:
I  AM  NOTICING  A  TREND  WHERE  PEOPLE  WHO  DON’T  LIKE  TONY  STARK  ARE  ALSO  PEOPLE  WHO  HAVEN’T  WATCHED  IRON  MAN  1,  IRON  MAN  2  AND  /  OR  IRON  MAN  3   (  USUALLY  THE  FIRST  TWO  PREDOMINATELY  ) WHICH  IS  KIND  OF  BAFFLING  TO  ME.  IT’S  LIKE  PICKING  UP  A  BOOK  BUT  SKIPPING  THE  FIRST  FIVE  CHAPTERS;  WHERE  ALL  THE  CHARACTER  ESTABLISHING  AND  WORLD-BUILDING  HAPPENS. WHILE  I  KNOW  THAT  ISN’T  THE  CASE  FOR  EVERYONE,  THE  AMOUNT  OF  PEOPLE  OF  TELL  ME  THEY  HATE  TONY  STARK  BUT  ALSO  HAVEN’T  SEEN  HIS  MOVIES  IS  KIND  OF  MIND  BOGGLING.  

THE AVENGERS  FILMS  AND  HIS  APPEARANCES  IN  OTHER  FILMS  IN  THE  MCU  REALLY  DON’T  GIVE  YOU  A  GLIMPSE  OF  WHO  HE  IS; AND  THAT’S  ON  PURPOSE.  TONY  STARK  IS  A  MAN  WHO  HEAVILY  RELIES  ON  PUBLIC  PERSONA,  IT  HOW  PEOPLE  KEEP  UNDERESTIMATING  HIM.  HOW  HE  SKIRTS  BOUNDARIES  BECAUSE  NOBODY  EXPECT  HIM  TO  BE  MORE  THAN  THE  BILLIONAIRE  PLAYBOY.  IT’S  JUST  AS  MUCH  AN  ARMOUR  AS  THE  SUIT  IS.  AND  IN  THE  SITUATIONS  THE  AVENGERS  FILMS,  OF  COURSE  HE’S  GOING  TO  BE  THAT  PUBLIC  IMAGE  VERSION  OF  HIMSELF  HE  HAS  TO  BE.  HE  IS  IN  HIGH  STAKES  SITUATIONS  WHERE  HE  FEELS  OUTCLASSED. HE  EVEN  IMPLIES  THIS  FEELING  HIMSELF. NOT  IN  A  PRIDEFUL  WAY  (  OR  NOT  FULLY,  I  SHOULD  SAY  );  BUT  HE  HAS  TO  BE  A  BIG  GUY  ON  CAMPUS.  HE  HAS  TO  BE  ABLE  TO  GO  TOE-TO-TOE  WITH  NOT  JUST  THE  ANTAGONISTS  BUT  HIS  TEAMMATES  TOO.   YOU  NEED  THE  OTHER  FILMS  TO  GET  FULL  CONTEXT  AND  TO  SEE  THE  OTHER  SIDE.

THIS  LITTLE  BLURB  REALLY  ISN’T  GOING  TO  DO  FULL  JUSTICE  TO  WHAT  I’M  TRYING  TO  GET  ACROSS.  SO  IF  YOU  HAVEN’T  WATCHED  THE  IRON-MAN  TRILOGY  COMPLETELY,  I  URGE  YOU  TO  DO  SO  BEFORE  MAKING  A  CHOICE  ABOUT  TONY;  AND  APPROACH  IT  WITH  PERSPECTIVE.  NOT  WITH  A  MIND  ALREADY  MADE  UP  BY  EARLIER  IMPRESSIONS.

HE  EVEN  IMPLIES  THIS  FEELING  HIMSELF. blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Fun
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2RzozDG

by larriesxchild

Peter hates partying but Loki loves it and he wants Peter to just have fun even if that means having a foursome with two hot guys.

Words: 3541, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Thor (Marvel), Loki (Marvel)
  • Relationships: Loki/Tony Stark, Loki/Peter Parker, Peter Parker/Tony Stark, Peter Parker/Thor
  • Additional Tags: Rough Sex, Rough Oral Sex, Double Penetration, Choking, Making Out, Foursome - M/M/M/M, Sassy Peter, Loki and Thor Are Not Related


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2RzozDG

summary:
y'all know i'd lay down my life for platonic ironwidow but uh
consider
their first kiss is after siberia, in a beautiful au...
body:
y'all know i’d lay down my life for platonic ironwidow but uh

consider

their first kiss is after siberia, in a beautiful au where nat stuck around and accepted the charges for breaking the accords and apologized and fixed things, and it’s two am and neither tony or nat can sleep, so they’re sitting on the couch watching heathers and mouthing the lines, and then credits are rolling and they’re both tired and vulnerable, and they’re debating over who was the best character, and god tony’s adorable, and before nat quite knows what she’s doing she kisses him, and he kisses back

summary: I’ve watched 4 hour long documentaries trying to span all of what makes us human and they haven’t even come close to the moment...
body:
I’ve watched 4 hour long documentaries trying to span all of what makes us human and they haven’t even come close to the moment in Spider-man: Homecoming where Tony leans across Peter to open the door and Peter misinterprets it for a hug before he’s told that wasn’t the intent and he awkwardly gets out of the car

Like you just… you did it… that’s everything you need to know about the entire human experience.

And it was less than 10 seconds

I’m shook
